title: Provisioning: Immediate availability of {{.principal.id}} for role assignment
body: How do I make the http connector support provisioning role on new account requests? Example with a test API I made since eMSL @ Lilly is still pending changes: 1. Submit request for role, which will require new account: https://gpslab.conductor.one/task/34 2. API creates new account, but C1 gives error: error using connector provision [attempt #1]: ProcessConnectorActions/ResolveCreateAccount:: failed to provision app user: provision_app_user: failed to run transaction: provision_app_user: fa...
